title: Minions and Champion started to float around the map while playing
body: So I reset my internet and all that stuff (ISP: Suddenlink). I live in Texas. I started playing today and randomly started experiencing in game lag to where I can't last hit the minions or it shows that the gold is delayed. I did a repair on my client too and tried a custom game. My ms is 41-43 but still experiencing the floating around champions and minions. Anyone know how to possibly fix this? Other than what I have already done. Thanks!

replies.body:
Sounds like you're experiencing packet loss.  Could be a few causes as to why the packets are being lost (could be your ISP, could be the route your network is connected to our servers, problems with wireless, etc.)

I'd recommend going through the steps on our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article as a preliminary step to identifying the cause (particularly the part about checking for packet loss).

Let me know if this helps!

Do I need to send the report in a support ticket?
Or is it okay if I post it here to this discussion?

If you're still having troubles with your connection after going through the steps, I'd recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as we're likely going to need logs and such from your computer.  Forum isn't exactly a great place for those :)
